Wolfblade::
She was carrying the little girl bot and went to the CR room with 
Malice. "Hey, Uh, got any ideas on what to do next?"

Camoflage::
She had her arms wrapped around WOlfblade's neck and crying her 
little spark out. She sobbed and cried.

Wolfblade::
She looked very uneasy. "Uh, It's ok kid."  She tried to pat the 
little girl bot's back and comfort her, but didn't think she was 
doing a good job and had the look of a paniced bot on her 
face. "Malice, You take her. Perhaps you will have better luck with 
this. I'm no parent bot."  And tried to hand off the kid to Malice.

Camoflage:
She felt her body shift, water in her optics, she didn't see. She 
just reaaches out for the bot that was infront of her. Malice.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "bustercross365" <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice accessed the computer systems at a terminal and opened the 
> door to reveal two bots on the ground.  One was critically injured.
> "We'll get you to the CR chamber immediatly!  Wolfblade, grab the 
> other and follow me!"
> Malice gathered up the striken bot and stompe through the halls 
into 
> the CR room.  He opened an empty chamber and put the miserable bot 
> inside.  He close the chamber, and turned to see if Wolfblade was 
> with him.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
> <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> > Wolfblade::
> > 
> > She transformed into wolf mode and ran down the hall, passing 
> > him, "Slow poke."  She transformed back to bot mode and looked 
> around 
> > for the door open button. "Where in the pit is the door button in 
> > this place?"
